1.title: Jon Jones vs Daniel Cormier
1.plot: In the first episode of "UFC Bad Blood", light heavyweight champion Jon Jones prepares to take on his most hated rival, undefeated Olympic wrestler Daniel Cormier. The show chronicles the lives and training camps of these two elite mixed martial arts fighters as they prepare for the biggest fight of their lives at UFC 182.

2.title: Dominick Cruz vs Urijah Faber 3
2.plot: In this episode, bantamweight rivals Dominick Cruz and Urijah Faber train for their world title fight at UFC 199. This will be the third time these two men meet in mixed martial arts competition and attempt to settle a feud that began nearly a decade ago. "UFC Bad Blood" chronicles the history of this great rivalry and gives a look inside the lives and training camps of these elite athletes ahead of their bout in Los Angeles.

3.title: Nate Diaz vs Conor McGregor 2

4.title: Khabib vs McGregor
4.plot: Ahead of an epic lightweight title bout at UFC 229, "UFC Bad Blood: Khabib vs McGregor" delves into the rivalry between undefeated Dagestani champion Khabib Nurmagomedov and his nemesis, Irish superstar Conor McGregor.

imdb.plot outline: Jon Jones and Daniel Cormier squared off for a photo opportunity at the MGM Grand in August 2014 and a brawl between the two fighters and their camps ensued. Leading up to their fight on January 3rd 2015, this documentary goes inside the lives and training camps of the two fighters and explores the rivalry between a former Olympic wrestler and the current UFC champion.
imdb.title: UFC Bad Blood
plot: Jon Jones and Daniel Cormier squared off for a photo opportunity at the MGM Grand in August 2014 and a brawl between the two fighters and their camps ensued.
